changelog.description: Initial release.
Added Vulnerability Scanner.
Support for dark theme.
Implemented dynamic wavy line chart for service latency visualization.
Refactored changelog fetching to use a coroutine with proper threading.
Improved UI elements for better responsiveness and aesthetics.
Added service status card with live updates.
Optimized data fetching from remote JSON source.
Implemented real-time network connection tracking for all apps.
Added vibration feedback when starting/stopping the network tracking service.
Improved notification management for background services.
Added logging for inbound and outbound connections.
Enhanced network tracking to log all types of connections, not just WiFi and mobile data.
Implemented notification for every connection change event.
Introduced timestamp logging for each network event.
Refined UI for toggling network tracking service.
Improved permission handling for foreground services.
Set latency to 0 ms and static red chart when service is stopped.
Fixed bugs related to UI responsiveness during scanning.
Improved error handling for network requests.
Added user feedback mechanism for scan results.
